# The `DwarfEmitter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarfemitter">DwarfEmitter</a> presents interface to generate all debug info tables. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarfemitter">DwarfEmitter</a> presents interface to generate all debug info tables.

### emitCompileUnitHeader() {#a4accd66a455c721b157bbbee24908d61}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::classic::DwarfEmitter::emitCompileUnitHeader (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a> &amp; Unit, unsigned DwarfVersion)</>}>
Emit the compilation unit header for <code>Unit</code> in the .debug&#95;info section.

As a side effect, this also switches the current Dwarf version of the MC layer to the one of U.getOrigUnit().

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h/#l00148">148</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h">DWARFLinker.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitDebugNames() {#a94efe7bbf4c67ddede8b683eac67e13f}

<MemberDefinition
